Package commands

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Command<T>
    This is an abstract class for a serializable Command Object that will be used to send commands to some type of receiver
    DisconnectCommand
    This class extends Command, and it is specified to be sent to a GameServer by a GameClient It's purpose is to notify the Server that the client is closing the connection, so that the server can safely disconnect from the client
    SendClientMessageCommand
    This class is a Command used to send a text String from the GameServer to the GameClient.
    SendClientTowerCommand
    This class is a Command used to send a Tower object from the GameServer to the GameClient.
    SendServerMessageCommand
    This class is a Command used to send a text String from the GameClient to the GameServer.
    SendServerTowerCommand
    This class is a Command used to send a Tower object from the GameClient to the GameServer.
    TimeCommand
    This class extends Command, and it is specified to be sent to a GameClient by a GameServer every time the Timer ticks (20 ms)
